name: Custom Notice for Products
author: Hemant Jangir

sections.description:
This plugin is allows you to show notifications, alerts or announcements on product page and cart page.

With its two customization options:

What can Custom Notice for Products do for my store?

  1. Display custom messages to your customers on the cart and product pages.

  2. Add multiple notice.

  3. Add messages anywhere on cart and product pages (for example, display discount notices at the top of a product or product category page)

  4. Improve sales and average order value by encouraging spending to receive benefits – giving customers a reason why they should spend more can result in a 50% increase in up-sells!

4.Display dynamic notices according to product or product category.

short_description: Add notice, announcements, alerts, etc. on product and cart page of your store.
